name: Shafarik
description: The Shafarik font, named after Pavel Jozef Šafárik (1795–1861), Slovak-born scholar and one of the founders of modern Slavic philology, is a specialized font intended for an academic presentation of Old Church Slavonic (OCS) texts written in either the Cyrillic or Glagolitic alphabets. To contribute, please see github.com/slavonic/Shafarik .
author: Aleksandr Andreev
